attributes.action: Ask the UK Gov to regulate the price increase of Car insurance.
attributes.additional_details: We are asking that the UK Gov step in to help regulate these increase in costs during the cost of living crisis, as this will effect individuals who may need their cars for work and they will no longer be able o keep their vehicle. This in turn will result will effect poorer communities across the UK increasing the cost of living crisis.
attributes.background: Currently in the UK, the price of car insurance has increased by 48% on average. Some individuals are now finding themselves in situations where insuring their car has become untenable and as a result they are having to sell their vehicles.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918
